name: Grandma's Epic Puzzle Space Book
description:
Timmy took his Grandma's Puzzle Book, and with a little imagination and a lot of markers, Timmy has created an Epic Space Adventure!!

Instructions - Starting in the bottom right corner, fight your way up to the black hole in the top left corner.

Nonograms - each row and column has a one or more numbers as clues. A row labelled "3" for example will have 3 dots in a row. If a row is labeled "2 1", for example, then it has 2 dots in a row and then 1 more dot with at least one space between them.

Controls

move: WASD, Shift to Dash

puzzle: Left click for dots, Right click for X's
